value.name: Since George Floyd’s death, 17 people have died during police encounters in N.J.

value.name: 'We need to change': Reflecting on a call to action, one year after death of George Floyd
value.description: George Floyd's videotaped murder a year ago in Minneapolis wasn't merely the catalyst for worldwide protests, a wave of social activism or the starting point for new conversations about race, police brutality and equality.
